title: Why Cam Newton makes sense with the Pats plus Top 10 Offensive Lineman Rankings (OT, Interior) (Football 6/29)
description:
Cam Newton is set to become a New England Patriot, so who better to bring on than Sully from Boston, Tyler Sullivan. Sully joins host Will Brinson to discuss Cam's arrival and fit with the Pats (1:00). Is there any pressure to replace Tom Brady or is that still reserved for Jarrett Stidham? Tyler also helps kick off offensive rankings week by breaking down the most exciting position groups, the offensive line. We hear his Top 10 tackles in the league (18:30) as well as his Top 10 interior OL (26:30). Taylor Lewan didn't approve of the lists. Does Will? Do you?
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @TylerSully
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
